Subject: 1st Steerin mit ti implementation of Digi Y:

Kind reference is invited to CISF HQrs letter No, 522 Dated 04.02.2025 on the
above subject.

02. Vide letter ibid, it has been apprised that the 1st Steering Committee meeting
under the Chairpersonship of Secretary, MoCA is scheduled to be held at 1200 Hrs on
14.02.2025.

03. The agenda for the meeting is furnished below with a request to all Zonal DIsG
and DIsG CASOs to furnish the parawise comments on the given Agenda points.

i) Earlier random checks done at Bangalore and Delhi Airports-
presentation by BIAL and DIAL in presence of AAI. (Report from
respective CASOs, if any)

ii) Verification process and enrolment by Digi Yatra Foundation.

ii) Entry verification process by Digi Yatra Foundation

iv) SOP for 10% security checks at random.

v) Compliance of DPDP Act and action taken on recommendation of Niti

Aayog.

04. Further, the updated and consolidated status for implementation of Digi yatra
along with issues being faced in implementation of Digi Yatra from all ASGs in the
prescribed format (Enclosed as per Appendix-A) may also be provided to this HQrs
latest by 10.02.2025 for perusal of the Competent Authority.

05. This is issued with the approval of the Competent Authority.

AIG/ Airpart Sector
